Key Match Events: The Lakers rallied from a 22-point deficit to win 123-116
LeBron James led the turnaround in the third quarter with 11 points and three assists
Post-Match Reflections: After going down by 22 points in the first half, the LA Lakers rallied to earn a 123-116 victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers' defense stepped up in the second quarter, limiting Phoenix to 23 points
Austin Reaves joined James and Davis in carrying the home team
Others: The game was played on October 25, 2024
The LA Lakers played against the Phoenix Suns in the 2024-25 NBA season
